    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An analysis of Satellite pictures of earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Analyse der Satellitenabbildungen von Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une analyse des images satellites de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma análise de retratos satellite da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'analisi delle immagini satelliti di terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάλυση των δορυφορικών εικόνων της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un análisis de cuadros basados en los satélites 
de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A n explanation of what can be deciphered and mapped by observing satellite photographs of the earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mapping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine n Erklärung von, was dechiffroren werden und
abgebildet werden kann, indem man Satellitenfotographien der Masse 
beobachtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une explication de n de ce qui peut être 
déchiffré et tracé en observant les photographies satellites de la 
terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma explanação de n de o que pode ser decifrado 
e traçado observando fotografias satellite da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una spiegazione di n di che cosa può essere 
decifrato e tracciato osservando le fotografie satelliti della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εξήγηση ν αυτό που μπορεί να αποκρυπτογραφηθεί και
να χαρτογραφηθεί με την παρατήρηση των δορυφορικών φωτογραφιών της
γης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una explicación de n de qué puede ser descifrada
y ser asociada observando las fotografías basadas en los satélites 
de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
